attributes.action: Urge the London 2012 team to scrap the disastrous new logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The 2012 games should be our shining moment. London is a great city that deserves the best. 

The current logo, as well as being expensive, says nothing whatsoever about our country nor our capital city. 

We call on our leader to urge London 2012 to scrap this awful, much derided logo for a new one.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/2012LondonLogo/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
